monetary.description: Defines a monetary value (to 2 decimal places), between -99,999,999.99 and 99,999,999.99

incomeTaxYTD.description: Details the amount of income tax is due based on the year to date figures supplied

incomeTaxThisPeriod.description: Details the amount of income tax is due this period. This is based on the incomeTaxYTD less the amount in the same data item from the calculation result from the preceding period

calcDetail.description: A breakdown of the incomeTaxYTD figure

previousCalc.description: Points to the preceding calculation result from the same tax year
